name: Keep Your Session
description: Keep Your Chrome Session For Future Use
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com https://code.jquery.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com  https://ajax.googleapis.com blob: filesystem: chrome-extension-resource:; object-src 'self'
